content.p: Join more than 1,600 connections in our business network, from a range of companies and industries, as well as representatives from business support organisations. Our business engagement team will help you to explore how your business could partner with our university. Attend our regular webinars and events to discuss topical business issues. You will usually hear the latest research perspective from our academic community as well as the practical application from local business leaders. Have a topic you'd like to us to cover? Suggest a theme for a future event. Your opportunity to promote your business to the network, share your news, ask for feedback or recruit partners for a collaborative project. Get in touch to book your elevator pitch slot.
